name: Run Pixel Run
description:
Run Pixel Run is a simple idle / clicker game where you need to collect followers while running. You can close the tab and come later and see your earnings!

The game is the last stage of active development right now, and every feedback will be appreciated.

If your browser is in Spanish you will see the game in Spanish, otherwise the game will be in English.

In the options menu you can change from keyboard / mouse click, wipe data, and go full screen.

This is my first game and page in itch.io, so please any comments about the page, dimensions, controls, translations, will be really appreciated! 

Thanks for playing and have fun!!
